1354810.name: RPG Maker MV - TOKIWA GRAPHICS Giant Monsters Pack S No.1
1354810.description:
Grab this pack of Giant Monsters to add some seriously sinister bosses to your game! Featuring 4 huge, oversized, menacing creatures sure to create havoc for even the hardiest warriors, add new monster evolutions to surprise your players! The ultimate boss battle could be even trickier and more demanding with these evolved and upgraded giant monsters!

This pack will expand the variation and possibilities of these fantastic looking giant monsters.

Features:

* 4 giant monster battlers: Ogre, Chimera, Fenrir, Thanatos in 4 color variations; day / sunset / night / rain. Total of 16 battler graphics
* Each character comes with walking sprites in 2 variations (normal and dark shadow). Total of 8 sprites
* For use with RPG Maker MV only
1354810.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
